name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas W. JONES, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas W. JONES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Matter remanded to Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia for an evidentiary hearing on the question of the effectiveness of trial counsel.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Pamela P. Cohen, Philadelphia, Court-appointed for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Garold Tennis, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
490 A.2d 436
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas W. JONES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 18, 1985.
Decided April 23, 1985.
Pamela P. Cohen, Philadelphia, Court-appointed for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Garold Tennis, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
